db:abstract.db:para: The QNdefFilter class provides a filter for matching NDEF messages.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QNdefFilter encapsulates the structure of an NDEF message and is used by QNearFieldManager::registerNdefMessageHandler() to match NDEF message that have a particular structure.

db:section.db:title: QNdefFilter::QNdefFilter(const QNdefFilter &other)
db:section.db:para: constructs a new NDEF filter that is a copy of other.

db:section.db:title: void QNdefFilter::appendRecord(const QNdefFilter::Record &record)
db:section.db:para: Appends record to the NDEF filter.

db:section.db:title: void QNdefFilter::appendRecord(QNdefRecord::TypeNameFormat typeNameFormat, const QByteArray &type, unsigned int min = 1, unsigned int max = 1)
db:section.db:para: Appends a record with type name format typeNameFormat and type type to the NDEF filter. The record must occur between min and max times in the NDEF message.

db:section.db:title: bool QNdefFilter::orderMatch() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the filter takes NDEF record order into account when matching; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: QNdefFilter::Record QNdefFilter::recordAt(int i) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the NDEF record at index i.

db:section.db:title: int QNdefFilter::recordCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of NDEF records in the filter.

db:section.db:title: void QNdefFilter::setOrderMatch(bool on)
db:section.db:para: Sets the ording requirements of the filter. If on is true the filter will only match if the order of records in the filter matches the order of the records in the NDEF message. If on is false the order of the records is not taken into account when matching.
By default record order is not taken into account.

db:section.db:title: QNdefFilter &QNdefFilter::operator=(const QNdefFilter &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns other to this filter and returns a reference to this filter.
